trans-unit.source: Manages the overflow behavior of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gerencia o comportamento de estouro de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If there are more overflow items than can be displayed on the form, use the [ToolStrip Items Collection Editor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e681f3ab-94ba-4b2b-ac64-1dfad46caa25) to manage this situation.
trans-unit.target: Se houver mais itens de estouro que podem ser exibidas no formulário, use o [Editor de coleção de itens de ToolStrip](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e681f3ab-94ba-4b2b-ac64-1dfad46caa25) para gerenciar essa situação.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow"></xref> class derived from a base <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow"> </xref> classe derivada de uma base de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> from which to derive this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> da qual deriva este <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the control.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo objeto de acessibilidade para o controle.

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the CreateAccessibilityInstance method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Se você não chamar explicitamente o método CreateAccessibilityInstance, ele será chamado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>propriedade é referenciada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Para obter ou definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>propriedade, você deve adicionar uma referência para o `Accessibility` assembly instalado com o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the control.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> para o controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets all of the items that are currently being displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém todos os itens que estão sendo exibidos no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the DisplayedItems property to get everything the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> currently displays, including items the user did not add, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflowButton>.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade DisplayedItems de obter tudo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>exibe no momento, incluindo os itens que o usuário não tenha adicionado, como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflowButton>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflowButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow.Items%2A> property to get all items on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, including those not being displayed.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow.Items%2A>propriedade para obter todos os itens na <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, inclusive aqueles não estão sendo exibidos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"></xref> that includes all items on this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"> </xref> que inclui todos os itens neste <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the size of a rectangular area into which a control can be fitted.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o tamanho de uma área retangular na qual um controle pode ser ajustado.

trans-unit.source: The custom-sized area for a control.
trans-unit.target: A área tamanho personalizado para um controle.

trans-unit.source: An ordered pair of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> representing the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Um par ordenado de tipo <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa a largura e altura de um retângulo.

trans-unit.source: Gets all of the items on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>, whether they are currently being displayed or not.
trans-unit.target: Obtém todos os itens no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>, se eles estão sendo exibidos ou não.

trans-unit.source: Use the Items property to get all items on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, including those not being displayed.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade Items para obter todos os itens na <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, inclusive aqueles não estão sendo exibidos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow.DisplayedItems%2A> property to get only those items that are currently displayed on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow.DisplayedItems%2A>propriedade para obter apenas os itens que estão atualmente exibidos em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow.DisplayedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"></xref> containing all of the items.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"> </xref> que contém todos os itens.

trans-unit.source: Passes a reference to the cached <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LayoutEngine*> returned by the layout engine interface.
trans-unit.target: Passa uma referência para o cache <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LayoutEngine*>retornado pela interface do mecanismo de layout.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LayoutEngine*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine"></xref> that represents the cached layout engine returned by the layout engine interface.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine"> </xref> que representa o mecanismo de layout em cache retornado pela interface do mecanismo de layout.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnLayout method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnLayout também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Resets the collection of displayed and overflow items after a layout is done.
trans-unit.target: Redefine a coleção de exibidos e itens de estouro após um layout.
